conbody.p: Clicking on this will open a PDF version of the user manual.
Clicking on this will open a HTML version of the user manual.
Select software to add to your BTS.
Click on this to see which parts of the software are currently installed. Select a specific path and click "Uninstall" at the bottom of this window to uninstall those parts of the program.
NOTE: This does not uninstall BTS. To do this you have to delete all files from the installation path manually (see ).
